policies: {"Check-in":["From 14:00 hours"],"Check-out":["Until 12:00 hours"],"Cancellation\/<br \/>\nprepayment":["Cancellation and prepayment policies vary according to room type. Please enter the dates of your stay and check the conditions of your required room."],"Children and extra beds":["All children are welcome.","One older child or adult is charged THB 700 per person per night in an extra bed.","The maximum number of extra beds\/children's cots permitted in a room is 1.","Supplements are not calculated automatically in the total costs and will have to be paid for separately during your stay."],"credit card":["visa"]}
description:
Royal Phuket City Hotel酒店位于普吉岛繁华首府的中心地带，提供带私人浴室的宽敞空调客房，还设有桑拿浴室、室外游泳池和2间餐厅。

Hotel Royal Phuket City酒店的客房按照色彩鲜艳的泰国风格进行了典雅的布置，设有卫星电视和私人保险箱。客人可以在客厅角放松享用迷你吧内的冷饮。

客人可以利用空余时间在健身中心锻炼身体或是享受泰式按摩服务。想要和朋友一起度过欢乐时光的客人可以唱卡拉OK休闲。

位于19楼的Red Onion咖啡馆享有美丽的海岸景色，供应自助早餐。White Palms餐厅提供正宗的中餐。

酒店距离Hok Nguan Kung Shrine庙仅有7分钟步行路程，距离庆祖庙（Wat Chalong）有15分钟车程，距离普吉国际机场有35分钟车程。
address: 154 Phang Nga Road , Phuket Town , Phuket 83000 ,  Thailand
